leitej.crypto.asymmetric

Class CipherRSA

  • java.lang.Object
    • leitej.crypto.asymmetric.CipherRSA

  • public class CipherRSA
extends java.lang.Object
    The maximum amount of data that can be encrypted with RSA or El Gamal is normally limited by the size of the key, less any padding overhead that might exist.
    Author:
    Julio Leite
